reference.shortdesc: A message number is the identifier of a message that is produced by an application or program.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The msgnum element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the software domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows a msgnum element that identifies the number of the message that is returned by an application:
example.codeblock: A server log entry of I:0 is equivalent to the text message informational: successful.
